name: hail2u.net
description: This website publishes articles, documents, and projects about a web development etc.
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.format: npm run format_css && npm run format_js
scripts.postcontribute: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.postcss: cp -rT src/css/ dist/css/ && rm dist/css/test.html && cp -rT tmp/ dist/css/ && cp tmp/main.min.css src/partial/css.mustache && node bin/style-guide.js
scripts.postjs: cp -rT src/js/ dist/js/ && cp -rT tmp/ dist/js/
scripts.postupdate: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.precss: npm run test_css && npm run clear
scripts.prejs: npm run test_js && npm run clear
scripts.rebuild: npm run css && npm run img && npm run js && npm run html && node bin/document.js --articles
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
